document_data.name: Phalar
document_data.mainbody: '''Phalar''' was a [[drow]] [[Chosen]] of [[Vhaeraun]].<ref group="note">[[Erin M. Evans]] confirmed in [http://forum.candlekeep.com/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=18594&whichpage=1 a post] in the Candlekeep forum that he was a Chosen of Vhaeraun.
document_data.History: In [[1486 DR]], the disguised [[Dahl Peredur]] and [[Oota]] asked for Phalar's help to sneak inside the keep of [[Adolican Rhand]] in order to free [[Farideh]].
